text: Banijay is a French multinational television production and distribution company. It is the world's largest international content producer and distributor with over 130 production companies across 21 territories, and a multi-genre catalogue containing over 180,000 hours of original programming. It is headquartered in Paris. It was founded in January 2008 by St√©phane Courbit. ==References== Category:Entertainment companies Category:Companies based in Paris Category:Television production companies
